entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -30.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 9:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -30.3°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -33.1°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
